main event: A Fall River police officer observed an unidentified flying object in the sky on July 16, 1966.
interesting points: The object was described as being about 50 feet in diameter and bright white in color., The object was moving at a high rate of speed on a northeast heading., The officer monitored the object for approximately 30 seconds before it disappeared from view., The observation occurred at an altitude of about 2,000 feet., The case is considered valid due to the credible witness being a police officer.
